# GenX Package

A simple package to get Discord Nitro.
This package was only made to show how Python is good, and educational purposes.

# Install 
Run `pip install genx`

# How to use 

Nitro Classic
```py
import genx 

code = genx.nitro()
print(code)
```

Nitro Boost
```py
import genx 

code = genx.nitro("b")
print(code)
```
